channel.title: Sharing Files?
channel.description: [b]Ok, so today, I have been recently asked to help code a persons server, being delta I think on hamachi. It looks good, and he gave me the dl link for the files he already made changes to, but if a new character logs in, it doens't show up on mine, only the orignal owners pc. Is there any way to share files that we can both make changes to and still work? I am not hosting the server, just coding, thats why I need to share files with tthe origanal owner. A answer be my many thanks.[/b]

item.title: Sharing Files?
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

Dropbox

Dropbox

Dropbox is a modern workspace designed to reduce busywork-so you can focus on the things that matter. Sign in and put your creative energy to work.
